Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the speed of the bullet train, stating that it reaches an "unimaginable" speed of 4,800 km/h.
Understate: The claim understates the actual travel time between Osaka and Tokyo, stating that it takes just 10 minutes instead of the usual 2.5 hours.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the assertion that the bullet train can travel from Osaka to Tokyo in 10 minutes.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video footage is authentic and accurately represents the speed and duration of the bullet train journey.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation for the video, stating that it is a timelapse video of a 150-minute bullet train journey, not an actual real-time representation.
